title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: yarrawater package helps users explore changes Yarra River water quality 1990s 2020s. provides cleaned dataset, useful plotting functions, interactive Shiny app comparing water quality indicators pH, Salinity EC@25, Turbidity, Water Temperature.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: tools help users visualise different water parameters changed time.
code: library(yarrawater)  # Launch the interactive Shiny app run_my_app()  # Create a static summary plot plot_yarra_data()

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: can install package directly GitHub using remotes package:
code: # install.packages("remotes")  remotes::install_github("ETC5523-2025/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-nana0119") #> Skipping install of 'assignment4' from a github remote, the SHA1 (3d21392d) has not changed since last install. #>   Use `force = TRUE` to force installation library(yarrawater)

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Data: yarra_wq_clean — cleaned Yarra River water quality dataset. Functions: run_app() — launches interactive Shiny dashboard. plot_yarra_data() — creates plots comparing 1990s 2020s. Shiny: Located inst/shiny-app/, allowing users select parameters plot types interactively. Documentation: functions data objects clearly documented using roxygen2. pkgdown website:

what: Plot Yarra River water quality by parameter and decade — plot_yarra_data
title: Plot Yarra River water quality by parameter and decade — plot_yarra_data
text: Creates grouped boxplot comparing 1990s vs 2020s parameter. simple visualization version inclusion package.

text: cleaned dataset used Shiny app. dataset water quality observations Yarra River, comparing pre-pandemic (1990s) recent decades (2020s).

title: water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
water quality measurements from Victorian Department of Energy, Environment, and Climate Action. — yarra_wq_clean
text: data frame 888 rows 14 variables: Site ID Year record industry Industry factor revenue Revenue (BRL) net_profit Net profit (BRL) data frame 888 rows 14 variables: Datetime Date time water sampling. Parameter Type measurement ("pH", "Turbidity", "Salinity EC@25"). Value Measured numeric value parameter. Unit Measurement unit, e.g., NTU mg/L. Site Sampling location. Source Data source, e.g., EPA Victoria.
